name: Heavenly Turkey Soup
author: Jaymee
summary: This soup serves more than one purpose. It's a light, refreshing sunny-day lunch, yet warm and comforting on the rainy evening.
ingredients: 1 cup cubed turkey breast meat, with bone, divided
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1.8 ounce) tub instant dry lentil soup mix
directions: Place water, turkey breast bone, onion, garlic, pepper flakes, sea salt, and bouillon cubes in a large pot; bring to a boil
Reduce heat; simmer broth for 20 minutes
Stir broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, turkey breast meat, asparagus, bell pepper, and instant soup mix into broth
Return soup to a simmer; cook for 10 minutes
Ladle soup into bowls; top with bean sprouts
